name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: iDox.ai - Discover and redact sensitive data

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: iDox.ai discovers and pinpoints sensitive data in documents for you to review and redact before disclosing and sharing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
● iDox.ai Document Redaction

   Remove sensitive information fast and easily to protect your valuable information.

● iDox.ai Compare

   Compare two different digital documents side by side to ensure that the final is what you expect.

● iDox.ai Review

   Review before signing a contract for accelerating contract review and reducing risks for your business.


♦ BOOST PRODUCTIVITIES

iDox.ai is all about accelerating the process of how businesses handle their documents. We automate sensitive data discovery and redaction so that you can focus on what’s important: your business! 



♦ MEET DATA COMPLIANCE 

PII (personally identifiable information) and PHI (personal health information) are very important to customer privacy. If such data is made public, it leads to huge legal issues. iDox.ai is proven to help save time and money in this process, allowing you to be fully compliant with regulations such as GDPR or HIPAA.



♦ TEAM COLLABORATION 

Achieve efficiency in your business with the ability to collaborate simultaneously on documents across the Internet. All files are saved securely in the cloud, allowing rapid access from anywhere by any authorized user.



By installing the extension, you agree to iDox.ai Privacy and Terms (https://www.idox.ai/privacy-policy and https://www.idox.ai/terms-of-service)
